description:
Sunny, spacious top-floor 1 bed-room apartment in owner occupied building.

Great to wind-down and play a game of pool after a long day about the city. 

Short walk to B/Q, 2/5 trains, amenities on Flatbush, and bars and restaurants on Cortelyou RD.

First floor apartment occupied by friendly native Brooklynites, happy to offer city and neighborhood suggestions. 

Host is a life-long human right advocate. If you have any objections to socio-cultural diversity please do not stay here.
name: One of a kind, entire Brooklyn apartment
review: Tor is a great host that is caring and accommodating, and his flat is spacious, fun, clean, and has everything anyone could possibly need. Totally recommended!
